patthana23.45:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.45:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.45:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
